function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decreasing/diminished interest and avoidance of news about COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced compliance to public health measures, potential contribution to the spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Increased awareness campaigns, targeted education about the importance of staying informed","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms, social media outreach","People":"General public, particularly those experiencing COVID-19-related fatigue","Owner":"Public health authorities, educational institutions, media organizations"},{"Description":"Pandemic fatigue leading to desensitization and avoidance of news about the pandemic","Impact":"Decreased motivation to follow recommended protective behaviors, potential increase in emotional distress","Mitigation":"Psychological support services, mental health interventions, proactive communication strategies to address pandemic fatigue","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, mental health apps, online support communities","People":"Individuals experiencing pandemic fatigue, mental health professionals","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health organizations, community support groups"},{"Description":"Avoidance and denial of COVID-19-related information leading to reduced compliance with public health measures","Impact":"Risk of increased spread of the disease, potential strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Public health messaging, targeted interventions to address misinformation, community engagement efforts","Technologies":"AI-powered misinformation detection tools, social media monitoring algorithms, virtual town halls","People":"Community members, individuals susceptible to misinformation, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health agencies, community organizations, technology companies"}]}
